Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens
Creation date: 17.10.2001
04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
16.10.2009 SH SCR14986 Added CLNT214_CLIENT_TYPE handing, display
related CODE_DESCRTION on client header screen
22.04.2004 JJ Fixed debtor selection for ODC programs
20.02.2003 JJ SCR3056 added par to call init selection in CheckExistingIDCR
28-29.10.2002 JJ SCR2442 -removed option to delete selection on exit
-added task to get different debtor for limit (tab 4)
-added call new OID300_6 to synchronize existing selection on initialization
11.09.2002 JJ SCR1984 cont. -fixed lock/clear/.. init mode
-fixed call odhc05 (archve) within form 6
03-05.09.2002 JJ SCR1984 -dropped clearing of temp file
-temp file now used with IDCR_ID
-calling DEBC achive instead of DEBH archive
-added logical lock
16.04.2002 JJ SCR1122 Now using pi... for initialisation of entry
-header task is called with immediate exit when OID300 is called with pars
15.04.2002 JJ SCR1124 added SID to main (this) task
13.03.2002 JJ SCR996 modify right required for access
16.01.2002 JJ SCR#571 added pars to call ODHC006 (ADMN/CLNT)
12.12.2001 JJ SCR#443 added direct access to tabs using CTRL+(1-6)
If called with parameters the selection is fixed
13.02.2002 JJ SCR996 Any right but no modify right =>error
I: Initialize
After initialization commit and go online unless...
After initialization start at tab 1
Check/fetch header data
If header is not modifiable and combination CLNT/DEBH is invalid
we have to give an error and exit
When header ok check for existing delcredere investigation
Start new investigation?
User reply 'N', exit
User reply 'Y' fetch new IDCR
End new IDCR
Locked selection, exit
End locked selection
End exit after header check
End Initialization
O: Online
Clear keyboard buffer (if we're here we're not on our way out)
Create New IDCR if a new number was fetched during initialization
Lock IDCR row and synchronize existing selection
If WhatToDo is empty when coming from online treat as cancel
(ends after on empty)
S: Ok handling = save and exit
Find (client/debtor change)
check new entry
msg ID0019 "Current selection wil be lost, continue anyway?" Y/N
close/commit return online (reinitialize)
End new header valid
If new entry does not check out error and reset/online
End Header change
T: Tab
Do not close/commit transaction yet
C: Cancel = release logical lock and exit
release IDCR
call Archive (ODC004 = ODHC005 as ODC)
call Limit history (ODC009 = ODHC006)
call Paid invoices, works on DEBC level (not DEBH)
therefore check and :
1 DEBC match: use
multiple DEBC matches: select

ItemsList.valUnicode: 1 Preparations,2 Final handling,3 Archive,4 Limit history,5 Client risk,6 Paid invoices;93,750

Text.valUnicode: Enter client and debtor to continue

Text.val: Tab event with empty new tab =cancel
If next tab is returned empty, v.WhatToDoMain is set according to
v.WhatToDoNext (empty = exit and is treated as cancel)
if ctrl+N is used and current tab is an ODHC prog generate lots of exits
else generate one exit
-we can't change the behaviour of ODHC programs to suit our needs without
Msgbox ID0020 Several entries for this debtor/client please choose one
If a debtor is selected continue with required ODC program
else return to precious tab
End task condition on COUNTER(0)>= 2
we're only interested in 0,1, more than 1
If only one found use it
task is yes after, would have used a link but we're looking for nulls
in the where clause
when using existing IDCR also build initial selection
where INVO_IDCR = Selected IDCR
